context: I like As Good as It Gets so much! Jack Nicholson was great in it. What was the name of the actress who starred with him?

Yes, she also was in the film All Over Me and Foxcatcher. Do you have any information on The Nortorius Bettie Page?
I don't, but Channing Tatum was in Foxcatcher as well.
Yes, Channing Tatum also starred and produced Magic Mike. Are there any other movies he starred in?
White House Down is one of my favorites that he was in.
I think he was in a movie with Tom Cruise, something about aliens. Do you know what the name is?
resp: That movie was War of the Worlds.
